verses.roman:
nandaṁ sunandaṁ garuḍaṁ
pracaṇḍaṁ caṇḍaṁ eva ca
mahābalaṁ balaṁ caiva
kumudaṁ kamudekṣaṇam

synonyms: nandam sunandam garuḍam—named Nanda, Sunanda and Garuḍa; pracaṇḍam caṇḍam—Pracaṇḍa and Caṇḍa; eva—indeed; ca—also; mahā-balam balam—Mahābala and Bala; ca—and; eva—indeed; kumudam kumuda-īkṣaṇam—Kumuda and Kumudekṣaṇa.
translation: One should worship the Lord's associates Nanda and Sunanda, Garuḍa, Pracaṇḍa and Caṇḍa, Mahābala and Bala, and Kumuda and Kumudekṣaṇa.
